## Checklist

- [ ] Draft file added to `drafts/` directory
- [ ] `policy-review` label applied to this PR
- [ ] Review deadline is clearly stated above
- [ ] Link to current policy version is provided (if revision)
- [ ] Community has been notified of the review period

---

## Reviewer Instructions

1. Click **"Files changed"** above to see the full proposed policy text (or the diff if this is a revision).
2. To comment on a specific line, hover over it and click the **blue `+` icon**.
3. To leave a general comment, scroll to the bottom and use the comment box.
4. A free [GitHub account](https://github.com/signup) is required to comment.
